hero.welcome: Hello, my name is Michael de Lima Rocha
hero.name: Michael de Lima Rocha

sobre.title: About
sobre.subtitle: A little about me
sobre.description: My professional journey began in another field, where I worked as a production manager, but my passion and dedication to studies led me to a career transition to the development area. Today, my mission is to transform ideas into efficient solutions, creating scalable and impactful applications. My experience includes JavaScript, Python, ReactJS, React Native, SCSS, LESS, Bootstrap, Git, GitHub, HTML, and CSS, in addition to strong knowledge in code organization and optimization. I constantly seek to improve my skills and explore new technologies to always deliver the best result. Besides Coding When I'm not developing, I enjoy camping with my family, playing video games with my son, and watching series and movies. I'm a fan of suspense and comedy, and my favorite series is The Office, while my favorite movie is Shutter Island. I'm also a passionate supporter of Santos FC and greatly value outdoor moments. I'm always open to new opportunities, challenges, and connections. Let's chat? ðŸš€
